div.p: Monthly sea ice extent trends over the 40-y period 1979â€“2018 for the following: Weddell Sea ( A); Indian Ocean ( B); Western Pacific Ocean ( C); Ross Sea ( D); Bellingshausen/Amundsen Seas ( E); and Southern Hemisphere as a whole ( F). The plotted trend values are the slopes of the lines of linear least squares fit, and each data point has a vertical bar with tick marks at 1 and 2 SDs above and below the trend value. Single-letter abbreviations are used for months.
